common.welcome: Easy sharing of safe foods for everyone

header.importantNotice: (Important) Information may change daily, so please check with the store

menu.uploadTooltip: Just take a photo of the product package!

hero.title: Easy sharing of safe foods for everyone
hero.description:
Just take a photo of the ingredient list!
Easily share allergy information
and build a safe food life together

steps.title: Information sharing in just 3 steps
steps.description: Just take a photo of the ingredient list to share allergy information with everyone

membership.title: Benefits of Membership
membership.description: More peace of mind and convenience with detailed settings tailored to you.

contamination.title: Contamination Settings
contamination.description: Manage contamination possibilities (trace) individually. Helpful for determining trace amounts.

fragrance.title: Fragrance Content Settings
fragrance.description: Manage fragrance ingredients individually. More detailed allergy management is possible.

heatStatus.title: Upload photos & set allergy items
heatStatus.description: Upload product photos and set allergy items per product (direct, fragrance, contamination, heat).

favorites.title: Favorites Feature
favorites.description: Save safe products and stores to your favorites.

latestInfo.title: Latest information shared by everyone
latestInfo.noData: No information matching your criteria was found
latestInfo.noDataDescription: Try adjusting your allergy conditions or categories, or share new product information.

bottomCta.title: Would you like to share information too?
bottomCta.button: Would you like to share information too?

stepsSection.title: Information sharing in just 3 steps
stepsSection.description: Just take a photo of the ingredient list to share allergy information with everyone

step1.title: 1. Photo
step1.description: Just take a photo of the ingredient list section with your smartphone

step2.title: 2. Check
step2.description: AI analyzes ingredients. You can check and correct allergy information

step3.title: 3. Share
step3.description: Information is shared and helps others with the same allergies

searchSection.title: Search shared information
searchSection.subtitle: Find safe options from product and restaurant information shared by everyone

noData.title: No information matching your criteria was found
noData.description: Try adjusting your allergy conditions or categories, or share new product information.

capture.title: Please take a photo of the product's ingredient list
capture.maxPhotos: Up to 2 photos can be taken

tips.title: Tips for taking clear photos
tips.tip1: Focus on the ingredient list section
tips.tip2: Take photos in a bright place without shadows
tips.tip3: Make sure the text is clearly visible and in focus
tips.tip4: Take a large photo of the ingredient section, not the entire package
tips.tip5: Up to 2 photos can be selected (displayed as reference)

messages.maxImagesReached: You can select up to 2 images.
messages.maxImagesRemaining: You can select up to 2 images. You can add {{count}} more.

search.areaRequired: Enter a prefecture name to search for allergy-friendly stores
search.noResultsDescription: Please try changing your search conditions

If you have any display issues or suggestions for improvements, please send them to us.
Thank you emails also boost our motivation, so we're always happy to receive them.

messages.submitFailed: Failed to send. Please try again later.

about.title: About EATtoo
about.subtitle: Can I eat it?
about.description: This site was born from family conversations asking 'Is it safe to eat this?' We hope that people with food allergies can easily determine their allergies and feel a little happier.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to eliminate the anxiety and doubts that people with food allergies feel when dining out, and to provide an environment where we can clearly answer the question 'Is it safe to eat this?'

questionSolving.title: Question Solving
questionSolving.description: We provide clear answers to daily questions like 'Is it safe to eat this?' with detailed allergy information

safety.title: Safety Assurance
safety.description: We manage allergy information with strict standards and provide an environment where you can enjoy dining out with peace of mind

peaceOfMind.title: Peace of Mind
peaceOfMind.description: We aim to create a society where people with allergies and their families can enjoy meals with complete peace of mind

lackOfInfo.title: Lack of Information
lackOfInfo.description: "Even when I ask the staff, I don't get detailed information..."

limitedChoices.title: Limited Choices
limitedChoices.description: "I end up going to the same restaurants all the time..."

detailedInfo.title: Detailed Allergy Information
detailedInfo.description: You can check all 28 allergen categories in advance

safeRestaurants.title: Safe Restaurant Selection
safeRestaurants.description: We carefully select and feature only restaurants that are proactive about allergy management

newDiscoveries.title: New Discoveries
newDiscoveries.description: We provide opportunities to discover safe restaurants you never knew existed

fullSupport.title: Complete 28-Item Support
fullSupport.description: We fully support all 28 allergen categories: 8 mandatory and 20 recommended items

curatedRestaurants.title: Curated Restaurants
curatedRestaurants.description: We carefully select and feature only restaurants that sincerely work on allergy management

realtimeUpdates.title: Real-time Information Updates
realtimeUpdates.description: We work with restaurants to update menus and allergy information in real-time

cta.title: No more worrying about 'Is it safe to eat?'
cta.description: With free registration, you can access more detailed allergy information and favorite features
cta.button: Start safe dining with free registration now
